overview: Jack denies to help his boss’s corrupt. He must fled to foreign country to find his older friend, Saksit. There, he faces many difficulties, moreover he is robbed. He meets a Thai girl, which is very kind and nice. But everything becomes more turmoils when the killer arrives at his hiding place and tries to finish his job.
tagline: Flee to the end of the world, but the world is still on fire.
title: The Immigrant
